author: Merrilees Parker
method: Mix all the ingredients for the shots together.  Keep refrigerated in a jug until ready to serve. To serve, place the glasses on a plate or tray pour some bloody mary mix into each one.  Finish with a little cucumber and a pinch of black pepper.
ingredients: 150ml/Â¼ pint vodka, chilled,  250ml/9fl oz thin tomato juice, chilled,  1 lime, juice only,  2 tsp freshly grated horseradish,  1 tsp celery salt ,  a good shake of Tabasco ,  1 tbsp Worcestershire sauce ,  1 cucumber, peeled, sliced and very finely julienned,  1 tsp cracked black pepper,  10 shot glasses, chilled
